name: waltti-apc-journey-matcher
description: Match APC messages from the vehicles with GTFS Realtime messages to augment the APC messages with vehicle journey metadata

scripts.build: npm run build:protobuf && npm run build:quicktype && npm run build:src
scripts.build:quicktype: npm run build:stringent-apc && npm run build:matched-apc
scripts.build:gtfsrt: mkdir -p ./src/protobuf && rm -f ./src/protobuf/gtfsRealtime.* && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 --out ./src/protobuf/gtfsRealtime.js ./protobuf/gtfs-realtime.proto && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 ./protobuf/gtfs-realtime.proto | pbts --out ./src/protobuf/gtfsRealtime.d.ts - && prettier --write ./src/protobuf/gtfsRealtime.{js,d.ts}
scripts.build:stringent-apc: mkdir -p ./src/quicktype && rm -f ./src/quicktype/stringentApc.ts && quicktype --out ./src/quicktype/stringentApc.ts --top-level StringentApcMessage --lang ts --src-lang schema --src ./quicktype/stringent-apc-from-vehicle.schema.json --no-date-times --alphabetize-properties --telemetry disable --converters all-objects && prettier --write ./src/quicktype/stringentApc.ts && export TMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && echo '// @ts-nocheck' > "${TMPFILE}" && cat ./src/quicktype/stringentApc.ts >> "${TMPFILE}" && mv "${TMPFILE}" ./src/quicktype/stringentApc.ts
scripts.build:matched-apc: mkdir -p ./src/quicktype && rm -f ./src/quicktype/matchedApc.ts && quicktype --out ./src/quicktype/matchedApc.ts --top-level MatchedApc --lang ts --src-lang schema --src ./quicktype/apc.schema.json --no-date-times --alphabetize-properties --telemetry disable --explicit-unions --converters all-objects && prettier --write ./src/quicktype/matchedApc.ts && export TMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && echo '// @ts-nocheck' > "${TMPFILE}" && cat ./src/quicktype/matchedApc.ts >> "${TMPFILE}" && mv "${TMPFILE}" ./src/quicktype/matchedApc.ts
scripts.check-and-build: npm run build:protobuf && npm run build:quicktype && npm run ts:check && npm run prettier:check && npm run eslint && npm run test && npm run build

author: haphut <haphut@mistmap.com>
